mapper.insert: INSERT INTO walk_crew_member (crewId, memberId, status, joinedAt) VALUES (#{crewId}, #{memberId}, 'PENDING', NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT wc.* FROM walk_crew wc JOIN walk_crew_member wcm ON wc.id = wcm.crewId WHERE wcm.memberId = #{memberId} LIMIT 1
SELECT wc.* FROM walk_crew wc JOIN walk_crew_member wcm ON wc.id = wcm.crewId WHERE wcm.memberId = #{memberId}
SELECT wcm.*, m.nickname, wc.title FROM walk_crew_member wcm JOIN walk_crew wc ON wcm.crewId = wc.id JOIN member m ON wcm.memberId = m.id WHERE wc.leaderId = #{leaderId}
